trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SEQ_00<tab>Swozblaet, the master merchant of Hawkers' Alley, wants you to look into current market prices.

TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SEQ_01<tab>Swozblaet has bid you pose as a customer and glance over the wares being sold by Iron Thunder, Kyokyoroon, and Syneyhil. Strike up a conversation with the three merchants, and surreptitiously record the prices of their goods.
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SEQ_02<tab>You have completed your survey of market prices. Deliver the price list to Baensyng on West Hawkers' Alley.
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SEQ_03<tab>You have delivered your report to Baensyng. According to the prices you recorded, the markets seem free of any shady dealings for another day.
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the price list to Baensyng.
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SWOZBLAET_000_0<tab>You, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>─adventurer. I have work for you. I would have you pose as a customer and survey the market's current prices.
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SWOZBLAET_000_1<tab>Surely I did not see you balk at so simple a task? All you need do is strike up a conversation with the shop owners, and glance over their wares.
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SWOZBLAET_000_2<tab>There are three merchants that interest me: Iron Thunder, Kyokyoroon, and Syneyhil.
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SWOZBLAET_000_3<tab>Write down all you see on this price list, and hand it to Baensyng on West Hawkers' Alley. He shall reward you for your service.

TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_IRONTHUNDER_000_10<tab>Well met, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>! Cast your peepers over these beauties! Not a spot of rust to be found! Every piece fresh from the forges of Naldiq & Vymelli's!
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_KYOKYOROON_000_20<tab>Kyokyoroon welcomes well-come customer! Kyokyoroon loves his lovely trade! Kyokyoroon's goods are goodly made!

TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SYNEYHIL_000_30<tab>A fine <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> to you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. What can I interest you in t─ Why, you seem interested in most everything, don't you? Is this another one of those investigations!? Well, I have nothing to hide!
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_BAENSYNG_000_40<tab>Yer the one what made a list for Swozblaet? Let's 'ave it, then.
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_BAENSYNG_000_41<tab>Mmm, nothin' wrong with the markets, far as I can tell.

TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_BAENSYNG_000_42<tab>Ye ofttimes get pirates sellin' stolen goods at cutthroat prices, an' that drives the numbers down right across 'Awkers' Alley. Thanks to these reports, though, we can tell at a glance when shady dealin's are takin' place. Good work, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>.
